thread.title: The 10 Biggest Crowdfunding Campaigns: Where Are They Now?

author: Deborah Gage
title: The 10 Biggest Crowdfunding Campaigns: Where Are They Now?
text:
Crowdfunding is usually a pretty modest endeavor. Most people are seeking only a few thousand dollars, and many of them fail to hit even those goals.
But then there is the one-in-a-million case. The entrepreneurial idea that not only beats its goal but beats it dozens of times overâ€”or hundreds.
Like the father and son who wanted $70,000 to... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
